title: I, A Kept Man, Am The Pet Of Two High-Spec Men!
alternative_title: Himo no Ore; Super Daring Futari ni Kawaremasu! ; ヒモの俺、スパダリふたりに飼われます！
status: Himo no Ore; Super Daring Futari ni Kawaremasu! ; ヒモの俺、スパダリふたりに飼われます！
description:
Description :
        Yusuke, who lives as a kept man, suddenly loses his home one day! When he goes to a bar to drown his sorrows, he ends up being caught by debt collectors. To make matters worse, he's injected with an aphrodisiac...?! In this desperate situation, two attractive individuals, the handsome Kaito and the beautiful Haruomi, appear. Yusuke, whose uncontrollable lu** doesn't stop due to the aphrodisiac, is taken home by the two of them, and... "Don't look away from me while we're having s**." "Yusuke, you like having your a** messed up, don't you?" Monopolizing the infatuation of 2 high-spec men. The pampered pet Yusuke's overly naughty threesome cohabitation life!+
